name: market for aircraft, passenger, very short haul | aircraft, passenger, very short haul | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/21932/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'aircraft, passenger, very short haul', in the Global geography.;No transport is considered in this market. Potential initial transfer of the airplain from the production site is neglected.;This product is a mobile infrastructure that is used in the service of transportation. The aircraft is defined as passenger aircraft, representing the infrastructure used to transport only passengers in a passenger flight, while it is capable of travelling trips up to 800 km. It has a lifetime capacity of 671,000,000 metric ton*km and a lifetime distance of 49,000,000 km. The aircraft has an operating empty weight (OEW) of 38.3 tons and each passenger is accounted for 105 kg.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'aircraft, passenger, very short haul',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of  aircraft, passenger, very short haul', to the consumers of this product. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
